channel.title: Need help [Drop]
channel.description:
Hey guys,
So I have a problem and I don't know how to remove/fix this.
The problem is, EVERY monster drops dragon boots..So they're easy to get. But they're not in NPCdrops..So is there a way to remove/change this?
Help will be much appreciated!

item.title: Need help [Drop]
item.dc:creator: @CreativityScape CreativityScape
item.description:
@CreativityScape wrote:

[quote=“Revamp dis Shit, post:2, topic:536180”]Yo wise up a lil?
Atleast tell us the damn source you’re using.[/quote]
Should have told that I’m new to this which makes me an completely idiot @ RSPS

But alright, I’m using the source from Tyreatta. It’s DeathlyPvpz though
